nameEntry.part: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository
ISMAPNG Archives and Heritage - Community Central A in Bathurst, New South Wales

biogHist.abstract: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository in New South Wales holds records of institutions formerly run by the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregation. Any records related to children in out-of-home care were transferred to the ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales on 21 March 2016.
biogHist.p: Applications for access must be made, in writing, to the Archivist, providing personal identification documents to establish the right to access information. Physical access to the records is not permitted due to their fragility and the need to protect the confidentiality of information concerning other persons. Information will be forwarded by mail.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives ( - 2011)
ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales (2012 - )

descriptiveNote.p: Any records related to children in out-of-home care held by Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository were transferred to the ISMAPNG Archives - Institute Centre in Stanmore, New South Wales by 21 March 2016.
